Config.Resource: SELECT product.LABEL as label, product.RATE as rate ,SUM(cus_tender.INVESTMENT) AS investment_total FROM DT_FIN_CUSTOMER cst LEFT JOIN DT_FIN_CUSTOMER_TENDER cus_tender ON cst.OUID = cus_tender.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT JOIN DT_FIN_TENDER tender ON cus_tender.TENDER_ID = tender.OUID LEFT JOIN DT_FIN_PRODUCT product ON tender.PRODUCT_ID = product.OUID WHERE cst.MARKETER_ID = {marketer_id} GROUP BY product.LABEL

SELECT cst.*, mmb.LABEL AS label,mmb.ICON_URL AS icon_url,mmb.LAST_LOGIN_DATE AS last_login_date FROM DT_FIN_CUSTOMER cst LEFT JOIN DT_FIN_MEMBER mmb ON cst.OUID = mmb.OUID WHERE cst.MARKETER_ID = {marketer_id} AND mmb.LABEL LIKE '%{label}%'
